error.no_device_file: The remote control code file is missing, please confirm the integrity of SmartAC integration or test the next code
error.invalid_device_file: Failed to parse the remote control code file, please try another code.
error.call_service_failed: Failed to call the service, please check the log or re-enter the correct service ID/entry ID

device.description: Please select one of the remote control codes, and enter the test process after submitting. Make sure to set the correct IR Transmitter Service ID/Entry ID.
device.title: Set remote control information

data.device: Remote control code for next test

test_on.description: The power-on command has been sent, has the air conditioner responded? Check and submit to go to the next step, do not check and submit to continue testing the next code
test_on.title: Power On

data.device: Remote control code for next test

test_off.description: The power-off command has been sent, has the air conditioner responded? Check and submit to go to the next step, do not check and submit to continue testing the next code
test_off.title: Power Off
